name: Alexandros Elias
story: Andreas Malas was born and raised in Athens, Greece. He enlisted in the military at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his natural leadership abilities. Andreas is a skilled tactician and is respected by his subordinates for his professionalism and dedication to their safety. However, his strict adherence to military protocol sometimes puts him at odds with his superiors. Despite his successes in the military, Andreas remains unmarried and has devoted himself fully to his career.
